sentence.Network_en: I let the horse drop his head to crop the spring grass.

sentence.Network_en: Problems will crop up and hit you before you are ready.
sentence.Network_cn: 你还未准备好，问题就会突然出现并打击你。

sentence.Network_en: I decided to crop the picture just above the water line.
sentence.Network_cn: 我决定把这张照片水印以下的部分裁掉。
